tasks.label: Pip freeze
tasks.command: source ${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/activate; pip freeze > requirements.txt; echo Requirements updated

tasks.label: Django - Make migrations
tasks.command: source ${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/activate; export APP_ENV=DEV; python mono/manage.py makemigrations

tasks.label: Django - Migrate
tasks.command: source ${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/activate; export APP_ENV=DEV; python mono/manage.py migrate

tasks.label: Django - Migrate to Prod
tasks.command: source ${workspaceFolder}/venv/bin/activate; export USE_CLOUD_SQL_AUTH_PROXY=true; python mono/manage.py migrate
